dependencyModal.title: Required Dependencies
dependencyModal.description: To run Phase {{phase}}: {{name}}, you must first complete the following phases:

phaseCard.label: Phase {{phase}}: {{name}}
phaseCard.quotaError: Your OpenAI API key has no available credits. Add funds at platform.openai.com/account/billing or switch to local AI (Ollama) in Settings.

columnMapping.title: Configure columns
columnMapping.info: Indicate which column of your file corresponds to each field. Only fields marked as required are necessary.

fields.titleDesc: The heading or title of the review. If your dataset has no title, leave it unassigned.
fields.textDesc: The full text of the review or opinion. This is the main content that will be analyzed.
fields.dateDesc: The date the stay, visit, or review was written. Optional — without it, temporal analysis will not be available.
fields.ratingDesc: The numerical score or rating given (e.g.: 1-5 stars). Optional — if not provided, it will be automatically determined during sentiment analysis.

datasetChange.title: Dataset Change Detected
datasetChange.description: You are about to load a different dataset than the previous one. This will delete all previously generated data.
datasetChange.warningTitle: The following data will be deleted:

warningItems.processedData: The processed data with analysis columns

datasetChange.backupRecommendation: Recommendation: Create a backup before continuing so you don't lose your current analyses.
datasetChange.confirmCheckbox: I confirm that I have already backed up my previous results or that I do not need to keep them.

deleteDataset.title: Delete Dataset
deleteDataset.description: You are about to delete the current dataset. This action cannot be undone.
deleteDataset.riskDescription: If you have run the pipeline with this dataset, deleting it and loading another dataset in the future will cause you to lose all analyses performed, including:
deleteDataset.backupRecommendation: Recommendation: Before deleting, create a backup of your analyses and visualizations.
deleteDataset.confirmCheckbox: I understand that deleting this dataset and loading another in the future will cause me to lose all analyses performed. I have saved a copy of the results I need or do not need to keep them.
